data.eml:eml: Re-examination of the eastern Pacific and Atlantic material of Alpheus malleator Dana, 1852, with the description of Alpheus wonkimi sp. nov. (Crustacea, Decapoda, Alpheidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur, Pachelle, Paulo P. G. (2013): Re-examination of the eastern Pacific and Atlantic material of Alpheus malleator Dana, 1852, with the description of Alpheus wonkimi sp. nov. (Crustacea, Decapoda, Alpheidae). Zootaxa 3637 (4): 412-431, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3637.4.2
